72.movie_plot: A civilian diving team is enlisted to search for a lost nuclear submarine and face danger while encountering an alien aquatic species.

94.movie_plot: A doctor discovers that he can communicate with animals.

107.movie_plot: When love drive you Mad 2 the Max...
